mapper.select: SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id limit 700

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where paidCompleted = 0 limit 700

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where parkId=#{parkId} and cardNumber =#{cardNumber} order by id desc limit 0,1

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where posChargeData.id = #{param1}

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId, parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id order by id desc limit #{param1}, #{param2}

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where parkId=#{parkId} order by id desc limit #{start}, #{count}

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where paidCompleted=false order by id desc limit #{param1}, #{param2}

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where paidCompleted=false and parkId=#{parkId} and chargeMoney >0 order by id desc limit #{start}, #{count}

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where parkId=#{parkId} and entranceDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} limit 700

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where entranceDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} limit 700
select count(*) from posChargeData

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where paidCompleted = 0 and cardNumber=#{param1} order by id desc limit 10

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where paidCompleted = 0 and cardNumber=#{carNumber} and parkId=#{parkId} order by id desc limit 10

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where cardNumber=#{carNumber} order by id desc limit #{count}

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where cardNumber=#{carNumber} and parkId=#{parkId} order by id desc limit #{count}

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,isEntrance,rejectReason,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where paidCompleted = 0 and cardNumber=#{param1} and exitDate is not null order by id desc

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where parkId=#{parkId} and entranceDate > #{day} and paidCompleted = 0 order by id desc

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,rejectReason,portNumber,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where cardNumber like '%${cardNumber}%' order by id desc limit 200

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,portNumber,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where cardNumber like '%${cardNumber}%' and parkId= '${parkId}' order by id desc

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,rejectReason,portNumber,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where cardNumber = #{cardNumber} and portNumber=#{portNumber} order by id desc
select * from posChargeData where parkDesc like '%${parkName}%' order by id desc limit 500
mapper.insert: insert into posChargeData(cardNumber, parkId, parkDesc, portNumber, isEntrance, operatorId, posId, chargeMoney, paidMoney, unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney, isOneTimeExpense, paidCompleted,isLargeCar, entranceDate, exitDate,url,rejectReason,payType) values(#{cardNumber}, #{parkId}, #{parkDesc}, #{portNumber}, #{isEntrance}, #{operatorId}, #{posId}, #{chargeMoney}, #{paidMoney}, #{unPaidMoney},#{givenMoney},#{changeMoney}, #{isOneTimeExpense},#{paidCompleted},#{isLargeCar},#{entranceDate}, #{exitDate},#{url},#{rejectReason},#{payType})
mapper.select: SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where entranceDate <= #{endDay} and entranceDate >= #{startDay} and parkId=#{parkId} order by id desc

select sum(chargeMoney) as chargeMoney,SUM(paidMoney) AS paidMoney,SUM(unPaidMoney) AS unPaidMoney, SUM(givenMoney) AS givenMoney,SUM(changeMoney) AS changeMoney where parkId=#{parkId} and entranceDate between #{startDay} and #{endDay}

SELECT posChargeData.id,cardNumber,parkId,parkDesc,payType,portNumber,rejectReason,isEntrance,isLargeCar,entranceDate,exitDate,url,operatorId,chargeMoney,paidMoney,unPaidMoney,givenMoney,changeMoney,isOneTimeExpense,paidCompleted FROM posChargeData LEFT JOIN park AS p ON parkId=p.id where entranceDate <= #{endDay} and entranceDate >= #{startDay} and parkId=#{parkId} and portNumber=#{carportNumber} order by id desc

SELECT SUM(posChargeData.chargeMoney) AS chargeMoney,count(*) AS count,SUM(posChargeData.paidMoney) AS paidMoney,SUM(posChargeData.unPaidMoney) AS unPaidMoney, SUM(posChargeData.givenMoney) AS givenMoney,SUM(posChargeData.changeMoney) AS changeMoney,posChargeData.operatorId ,feeOperator.name AS feeOperator FROM feeOperator LEFT JOIN posChargeData ON posChargeData.operatorId=feeOperator.account where entranceDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY feeOperator.account
SELECT count(*) as count FROM posChargeData WHERE parkId=#{parkId} AND entranceDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
SELECT count(*) as count FROM posChargeData WHERE parkId=#{parkId} AND exitDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
mapper.delete: delete from posChargeData where parkId=#{parkId} and entranceDate>=#{startDay} and entranceDate<=#{endDay}
